text.div:
COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Transient Ischemic Attack

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10-cm
    Code Display
    G45 Transient cerebral ischemic attacks and related syndromes
    G45.0 Vertebro-basilar artery syndrome
    G45.1 Carotid artery syndrome (hemispheric)
    G45.2 Multiple and bilateral precerebral artery syndromes
    G45.3 Amaurosis fugax
    G45.4 Transient global amnesia
    G45.8 Other transient cerebral ischemic attacks and related syndromes
    G45.9 Transient cerebral ischemic attack, unspecified

name: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Transient Ischemic Attack

concept.display: Transient cerebral ischemic attacks and related syndromes
Multiple and bilateral precerebral artery syndromes
Other transient cerebral ischemic attacks and related syndromes
